item.title: Can it automatically handle multiple products and services?
item.description:
Automatic Routing Feature link

By leveraging LiveAgent’s ticket system automation rules, you can automatically switch the learning information that the AI references based on the destination and content of incoming emails.

How It Works link

Automatic Identification link

The system automatically identifies which product or service the inquiry relates to based on the email’s destination address, subject line, keywords in the body, and other factors.

Automatic Knowledge Switching link

Based on the identification results, the AI automatically switches the knowledge base it references.

item.title: Can You Select the Response Tone (Formality)?
item.description:
Three-Level Tone Selection link

The AI Email Answer Composer allows you to select response tone from three levels. You can generate responses with optimal formality based on customer relationships and inquiry content.

Available Tones link

Casual link

A friendly writing style that uses approachable expressions and gives a personable impression.

Suitable situations:

  • Repeat customers
  • Casual brand image
  • Services targeting younger demographics
  • Inquiries from social media

Neutral link

A balanced writing style that is neither overly formal nor casual.

item.title: Integration between AI Email Response Creation and AI Response Assistant
item.description:
Integration with AI Response Assistant link

Response drafts generated by AI Email Response Creation (AI Answer Composer) are seamlessly transferred to the AI Response Assistant (AI Answer Improver) screen.

Integration Flow link

Step 1: Automatic Response Draft Generation link

AI Email Response Creation automatically generates response drafts from conversation history and knowledge base.

Step 2: Transfer to AI Response Assistant link

The generated response draft is transferred directly to the AI Response Assistant editing screen.

item.title: Knowledge Base Integration for AI Email Response Composer
item.description:
Knowledge Base Integration link

AI Email Response Composer (AI Answer Composer) can utilize knowledge bases such as product information, FAQs, and response manuals that have been pre-trained in AI chatbots for email responses as well.

Shareable Knowledge Sources link

FlowHunt’s knowledge source functionality allows you to configure and share various information sources.

Regular Website Crawling (Schedules) link

Use cases:

  • Product information pages
  • Help centers
  • Blog articles

Q&A link

Register frequently asked questions and their answers for AI to reference during response creation.

item.title: What are the implementation results and achievements of AI email response creation?

item.title: What Can You Do with Custom Instructions in AI Email Response Composer?
item.description:
Custom Instructions Feature link

The AI Email Response Composer (AI Answer Composer) allows fine-tuned adjustments by adding custom instructions. In addition to basic response drafts, you can include specific elements or use particular expressions.

Examples of Custom Instructions link

Adding Information link

  • “Include campaign information as well”
  • “Add contact information”
  • “Introduce related products too”
  • “Guide them on next steps”

Expression Adjustments link

  • “Include an apology”
  • “Emphasize gratitude”
  • “Add expressions that encourage future purchases”
  • “Mention that further inquiries are welcome”

Format Specifications link

  • “Summarize key points in bullet format”
  • “Explain procedures with numbered steps”
  • “Keep it concise within 3 sentences”
  • “Include detailed explanations”

Combination with AI Answer Assist link

You can perform basic adjustments with custom instructions in the AI Email Response Composer, and for more detailed adjustments, you can integrate with AI Answer Assist (AI Answer Improver).

item.title: What is AI Answer Composer?
item.description:
AI Answer Composer Overview link

AI Answer Composer is a LiveAgent feature that automatically analyzes incoming emails and contact forms using AI to generate response drafts when inquiries are received.

Basic Operation link

1. Reception link

When inquiries arrive via email or contact forms, LiveAgent’s ticket management system receives them.

2. Analysis link

AI automatically extracts and analyzes the inquiry content. If there’s conversation history, it understands that context as well.

item.title: What is Context-Aware Response Generation?
item.description:
Context-Aware Response Generation link

AI Answer Composer is an intelligent response generation tool that automatically analyzes ticket conversation history and generates appropriate response drafts with contextual understanding.

How It Works link

Conversation History Analysis link

AI reviews all interactions within the ticket:

  • Initial customer inquiry
  • Previous agent responses
  • Additional questions or information from customers
  • Attachment content (when supported)

Context Understanding link

Rather than simply picking up keywords, it understands the conversation flow and background.
